fact.description: The first-half is just kicking off.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Greece have a goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Greece at Estadio Castelao.
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Carlos Vera signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Greece's half.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Fortaleza to check on Panagiotis Kone, who is grimacing with pain.
Panagiotis Kone, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Andreas Samaris is the substitute for Greece.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Castelao.
Carlos Vera signals a throw-in for Ivory Coast, close to Greece's area.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Free kick Ivory Coast.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
Play has been resumed.
Orestis Karnezis is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Can Ivory Coast get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greece's Orestis Karnezis is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Greece is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Panayiotis Glykos (Greece) has replaced the possibly injured Orestis Karnezis.
Throw-in Greece.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Throw-in for Greece at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Greece close to the penalty box.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Throw-in Ivory Coast.
Carlos Vera signals a Greece throw-in in Ivory Coast's half.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ivory Coast's half?
Can Greece capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ivory Coast's half?
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ivory Coast awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Free kick in a good position for Greece!
Jose Holebas (Greece) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Greece drive forward and Georgios Karagounis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast's Didier Drogba has been booked in Fortaleza.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast have a dangerous throw-in.
Ivory Coast drive upfield and Arthur Boka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Greece defender.
Carlos Vera awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Georgios Samaras with an assist there.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Greece.
Yaya Toure (Ivory Coast) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in Ivory Coast.
4 minutes will be added to the first half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Greece.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
The first half has been concluded at Estadio Castelao.
Greece are coming forward and Lazaros Christodoulopoulos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ivory Coast's Cheik Tiote gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Ivory Coast awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a Ivory Coast throw-in in Greece's half.
Goal kick for Greece at Estadio Castelao.
Greece are pushing forward but Lazaros Christodoulopoulos's finish is wide of the goal.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Dimitris Salpingidis for Greece drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Sabri Lamouchi (Ivory Coast) is making a first substitution, with Wilfried Bony replacing Cheik Tiote.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Can Greece capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Salomon Kalou (Ivory Coast) has received a first yellow card.
Georgios Karagounis (Greece) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Carlos Vera awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Ivory Coast's Wilfried Bony breaks free at Estadio Castelao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Greece awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Ivory Coast get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Greece needs to be cautious. Ivory Coast have an attacking throw-in.
Ivory Coast's Salomon Kalou gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Greece at Estadio Castelao.
Throw-in for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
Carlos Vera awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Vasilis Torosidis hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Greece in Fortaleza.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Die Serey for Ivory Coast has been booked by Carlos Vera and receives a first yellow card.
Lazaros Christodoulopoulos for Greece gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Free kick Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
Throw-in Ivory Coast.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
That's a fine assist from Gervinho.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece make their third substitution with Fanis Gekas replacing Georgios Karagounis.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Sabri Lamouchi is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Ismael Diomande replacing Didier Drogba.
Carlos Vera signals a throw-in for Greece, close to Ivory Coast's area.
Ivory Coast needs to be cautious. Greece have an attacking throw-in.
Carlos Vera awards Ivory Coast a goal kick.
Lazaros Christodoulopoulos hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Fortaleza for Greece.
Ball goes out of play for a Ivory Coast goal kick.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Goal kick for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Giovanni Sio is replacing Gervinho for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
Ball safe as Ivory Coast is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Greece's Lazaros Christodoulopoulos misses with an attempt on goal.
Ivory Coast have a goal kick.
Free kick Greece.
Important block from the Greece defence as Salomon Kalou fires in a strike for Ivory Coast.
Ivory Coast have been awarded a corner by Carlos Vera.
In Fortaleza Ivory Coast drive forward through Salomon Kalou. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Ivory Coast in their own half.
Throw-in Ivory Coast.
Carlos Vera blows against Ivory Coast's Giovanni Sio for offside.
Goal kick for Ivory Coast at Estadio Castelao.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece.
Yaya Toure gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ivory Coast.
Carlos Vera signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
An attacking Greece player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! Georgios Samaras gives Greece the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Carlos Vera blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
